title: Did you turn "E.T." down M&M?
subtitle: It is rumored that Mars has expressed the opportunity to be the dessert that appeared in the film taken "E.T."
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: M&M lost the opportunity to be the candy used to lure the shy little space out of its hideout in 1982, allowing one of the most successful cases in putting film products into the hands of a rival who benefited greatly.
